item.title: How to make shop so that only admin + can use it
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

[quote=“lesterknome, post:7, topic:290341”]wth…

if (playerRights >= 2) 
	openUpShop(id);

You need to get out more[/quote]
Pardon?

Maybe if you wanted to do it like

[code]
/**

  • retard way.
    */
    if (!playerRights < 1) {
    if (!playerRights < 2) {
    if (!playerRights < 3) {
    if (!playerRights < 4) {
    if (!playerRights < 5) {
    if (!playerRights < 6) {
    if (!playerRights < 7) {
    if (!playerRights < 8) {
    if (!playerRights < 9) {
    if (!playerRights < 10) {
    if (!playerRights < 11) {
    if (!playerRights < 12) {
    if (!playerRights < 13) {
    if (!playerRights < 14) {
    if (!playerRights < 15) {
    if (!playerRights < 17) {
    if (!playerRights < 18) {
    if (!playerRights < 19) {
    if (!playerRights < 20) {
    openUpShop(id);
    }
    }
    }
    }
    }
    }
    }
    }
    }
    }
    }
    }
    }
    }
    }
    }
    }
    }
    }[/code]
    Other than that, I have no idea what you’re talking about.

Read full topic
